name: Figma Toolbar UI Kit
description:
As I find myself using Figma everyday, I thought it would be a fun challenge to recreate the mac app and make it responsive and interactive. Building Figma using Figma, very Inception-esque!


Please be aware that I am not employed by or affiliated with Figma, I am simply recreating a tool that I use everyday.


Feel free to play around with the file and share it!


Follow me for further interactive and responsive UIâ€™s of popular web apps.
